original_text: But he hanged the chief baker: as Joseph had interpreted to them.
korean_text: 떡 굽는 관원장은 매달리니 요셉이 그들에게 해석함과 같이 되었으나

sentences.original_text: But he hanged the chief baker:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 수석 빵 굽는 자를 매달았습니다:

sentences.original_text: as Joseph had interpreted to them.
